title: V-Calendar
description: V-Calendar is an open source calendar and date picker plugin for Vue.js. It uses attributes to decorate the calendar with various visual indicators including highlighted date regions, dots, bars, content styles and more. It can even display simple tooltips or popovers using custom slot content.

imgAlt: Landing page for St. Matthew's Day School
title: St. Matthew's Day School
description: A website for advertising and managing day-to-day operations for St. Matthew's Day School.
